state.description: Possible state: Claimed, UnClaimed, Inuse, Released, Reserved 状态

type.description: Supported: HDD, SSD, NVMe, RAM 磁盘类型

state.description: 组件状态 运行中 未就绪

items.description: 节点存储TOP5 使用率列表 5条列表上限

page.description: 当前页索引，从 1 开始，为 0 时，会自动重置为默认值 constants.DefaultPage

pageSize.description:
每页数据量，为 -1 时表示查询全部，为 0 时会重置为默认值
constants.DefaultPageSize

total.description: 总共有多少条目，请求时可以不用传递

driverStatus.description: driver status 驱动状态  运行中（Ready）,维护中（Maintain）, 离线（Offline）

nodeState.description: node state 节点状态 运行中（Ready）,未就绪（NotReady）,未知（Unknown）

pagination.description:
StorageNodesItemsList
StorageNodesItemsList StorageNodesItemsList `json:"items,omitempty"`
page 信息

allocatedCapacityBytes.description: AllocatedCapacityBytes 存储池已经分配存储容量

class.description: Supported class: HDD, SSD, NVMe 磁盘类型

name.description: Supported pool name: HDD_POOL, SSD_POOL, NVMe_POOL 存储池名称

totalCapacityBytes.description: TotalCapacityBytes 存储池对应存储总容量

pvcName.description: PersistentVolumeClaimName is the name of the associated PVC 绑定PVC

pvcNamespace.description: PersistentVolumeClaimNamespace is the namespace of the associated PVC 命名空间

volumeGroup.description: VolumeGroup is the group name of the local volumes. It is designed for the scheduling and allocating. 磁盘组

devicePath.description:
DevicePath is a link path of the StoragePath of the volume replica,
e.g. /dev/LocalStorage_PoolHDD/pvc-fbf3ffc3-66db-4dae-9032-bda3c61b8f85

nodeName.description: NodeName is the assigned node where the volume replica is located 节点

storagePath.description: StoragePath is a real path of the volume replica, like /dev/sdg.

synced.description: Synced is the sync state of the volume replica, which is important in HA volume 同步状态
